caption.p: Structural Similarity of Common Flavivirus Epitope Regions in E. Pairwise structural alignments for E proteins between WN virus (PDB 2I69) ( 25) and YF (PDB 6EPK) ( 28), Zika (PDB 5LBV) ( 26), or DEN (PDB 1OAN) ( 27) viruses. Structural elements encompassing the selected epitopes were analyzed, using the PyMOL algorithms “align” and “super.” These elements are colored in green (WN virus), yellow (YF virus), purple (Zika virus), and red (DEN virus). RMSD values are given in Ångström.
